about_the_game:
Donation DLC

This allows you to toss me a coin to support the development of Spellbook Demonslayers!

You won't get any additional content or features for buying this DLC, and it does not count toward a discount on the full game.
  • Dev supporters can apply for the beta-testing of Erabit's games without any contest. Join & ask mods.
Thank you for supporting Spellbook Demonslayers!

I'd love to hear your honest thoughts and feedback about the game in a Steam Review for Spellbook Demonslayers:
